file_content.text: It is done. Thank you.
The Grellik has been defeated. Your people are safe.
The Grellik will not harm anyone again.
Mission complete. The Grellik's been eliminated.
Congratulations! Voss is officially Grellik-free.
A sacred duty is fulfilled.
For Luta-Vel, and all Voss, I thank you.
Take this. You are welcome among the hunters, outsider.
Find the Grellik, it must not kill again.
Finally! I--wait. Who are you? How did you get this comm? Where is Luta-Vel?
I found this comm on a dead body, I'm sorry to say.
I'm afraid he's dead.
As I feared.
I have no idea who you're talking about.
Who's Luta-Vel?
Then he is lost or dead.
Tell me who you are, and then I'll think about answering questions.
Who's asking?
No outsider should have this comm. He is dead, then. Or lost.
Luta-Vel was a hunter. His sacred duty: Ending the lives of beasts that threaten the Voss.
The Grellik was his prey. It must not kill again.
I might be able to stop it for you.
I could help you.
Grellik?
The Grellik is a great nexu. Vicious. Cunning. It preys upon entire patrols of commandos.
Luta-Vel was our best. No other could destroy the beast.
No beast, however cunning, is a match for a Jedi Knight.
Leave it to me.
Allow me to handle this creature.
I can.
Trust me, if you need someone better than the best, Havoc Squad's got you covered.
Sounds like my kind of job.
I can probably kill this thing for you and be back in time for lunch.
Want to bet?
Confident.
Why is this particular animal such a threat?
What makes it so dangerous?
All nexu are swift and strong. The Grellik is clever.
Bones surround its lair. If you would finish this hunt, seek it there.
If you succeed, find me at the commando outpost.
Good luck. [Refuse quest]
Of course.
I have business of my own right now. Handle this yourself.
I can't help. [Refuse quest]
I will.
